Title: Establishes goals for participation by individuals with disabilities with respect to state employment, state contracts, legislative employment and judicial employment
Summary: Relates to establishing goals for participation by individuals with disabilities with respect to state employment, state contracts, legislative employment and judicial employment; establishes a goal of seven percent employment of individuals with disabilities within state agencies, the state legislature, unified court system and state contractors and subcontractors; defines terms.
LawCode: Add Art 17-C §§369-aa - 369-ee, Exec L; add §9-a, Leg L; add §219-e, Judy L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the legislative law and the judiciary law, in relation to establishing goals for participation by individuals with disabilities with respect to state employment, state contracts, legislative employment and judicial employment
